languages.text: "Мы понимаем, что ваше внимание к дому Эрэбис вызвано некими обстоятельствами. Позвольте узнать, чем мы можем служить вам. И мы послужим".

traits.locale_text: "Мы понимаем, что ваше внимание к дому Эрэбис вызвано некими обстоятельствами. Позвольте узнать, чем мы можем служить вам. И мы послужим".

languages.text: "We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you, and we will do what you require."
languages.original_text: "Мы понимаем, что ваше внимание к дому Эрэбис вызвано некими обстоятельствами. Позвольте узнать, чем мы можем служить вам. И мы послужим".

traits.locale_text: "We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you. And we will be."
"We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you. And we will be."
"We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you, and we will do what you require."
"We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you, and we will do what you require."
"We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you, and we will do what you require."
"We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you, and we will do what you require."

languages.text: « Nous sommes parfaitement conscients des circonstances qui vous ont poussées à vous intéresser à la maison Erebis. N'hésitez pas à nous faire savoir comment nous pouvons vous être utiles. Nous sommes à votre service. »
languages.original_text: "We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you, and we will do what you require."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes parfaitement conscients des circonstances qui vous ont poussées à vous intéresser à la maison Erebis. N'hésitez pas à nous faire savoir comment nous pouvons vous être utiles. Nous sommes à votre service. »

languages.text: «Sabemos que su atención a la casa Erebis viene causada por alguna circunstancia. Díganos en qué podemos servirle y haremos lo que sea menester».
languages.original_text: "We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you, and we will do what you require."

traits.locale_text: «Sabemos que su atención a la casa Erebis viene causada por alguna circunstancia. Díganos en qué podemos servirle y haremos lo que sea menester».

languages.text: 「あなた様がエレビス家を気にかけてくださったのは、ある事情からだということは分かっております。私達に何をお望みでしょうか。何でもいたします」
languages.original_text: "We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you, and we will do what you require."

traits.locale_text: 「あなた様がエレビス家を気にかけてくださったのは、ある事情からだということは分かっております。私達に何をお望みでしょうか。何でもいたします」

languages.text: “我们明白，您是出于某些原因才留意到了伊雷比斯家族。请告诉我们该如何为您服务，我们会按照您的要求去做。”
languages.original_text: "We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you, and we will do what you require."

traits.locale_text: “我们明白，您是出于某些原因才留意到了伊雷比斯家族。请告诉我们该如何为您服务，我们会按照您的要求去做。”

languages.text: "Uns ist klar, dass Euer Interesse am Haus Erebis durch irgendeinen äußeren Umstand ausgelöst wurde. Teilt uns bitte mit, wie wir Euch zu Diensten sein können, dann werden wir dem nachkommen."
languages.original_text: "We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you, and we will do what you require."

traits.locale_text: "Uns ist klar, dass Euer Interesse am Haus Erebis durch irgendeinen äußeren Umstand ausgelöst wurde. Teilt uns bitte mit, wie wir Euch zu Diensten sein können, dann werden wir dem nachkommen."

languages.text: "Erebis Hanesi'ne karşı ilginizin belli başlı formaliteleri de beraberinde getirdiğini fark ettik. Size nasıl hizmet edebileceğimizi lütfen bize söyleyin. Neye ihtiyacınız varsa yerine getiririz."
languages.original_text: "We realise that your attention to House Erebis was brought on by some manner of circumstances. Please let us know how we can be of service to you, and we will do what you require."
